headline.main: ICKES PRAISES AID OF OIL INDUSTRY; Says Results of Efforts Prove Government and Business Can Work Together

lead_paragraph: The American petroleum industry is going to do its part to speed a complete United Nations victory over the forces of greed and hatred if cheerful and ungrudging effort and untiring devotion will do it.
snippet: The American petroleum industry is going to do its part to speed a complete United Nations victory over the forces of greed and hatred if cheerful and ungrudging effort and untiring devotion will do it....

byline.original: By HAROLD L. ICKES Petroleum Administrator for War
